Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch Features: Stainless steel 46mm open face case with a matching curb chainMineral dial windowWhite dial with Arabic numeralsSwiss parts quartz movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 5 x 4.3 x 1.4 inchesShipping Weight: 8 ouncesItem model number: 3534Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description Matching curb chain. Stainless steel. Open face case. White dial. Arabic numerals. Swiss parts quartz movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 1.81 in. Dia. A handsome timepiece evoking a handcrafted gentleman's timepiece, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch features a crisp, white dial displaying black, decorative hour and minute hands along with easy- to-read, black Arabic numeral hour indexes. The round case is made from polished stainless steel and the watch includes a matching curb chain and deluxe gift box. Crafted with modern technology yet offering an appreciative nod to the gracious era of fine pocket watches, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Open Face Mechanical Pocket Watch is powered by Swiss quartz movement.
